FinancialSetupSectionSubtitle: Assign a work rule, shift, and salary before creating the employee.
WorkRuleFieldHint: Choose the rule that controls attendance and payroll expectations.
ShiftFieldHint: Choose the default shift for this employee.
AssignShiftButtonHint: Bulk-assign existing employees from the selected work rule to this shift.
AssignShiftSubtitle: Select employees already linked to this work rule for shift {{shift}}.
AssignShiftRequiresEmployees: Employees must already belong to this work rule before you can assign them to a shift.
NoEligibleEmployeesForShift: All employees assigned to this work rule are already part of this shift.
NoEmployeesAssignedToWorkRule: No employees are assigned to this work rule. Please assign employees to the work rule first before assigning them to shifts.
AddShiftForThisRuleHint: Create a shift that belongs to this work rule to start assigning employees.
AssignExistingShiftHint: Select an existing shift to assign to this work rule.
SelectShiftToAssign: Select a shift to assign to this work rule
NoAvailableShiftsToAssign: No available shifts to assign. All shifts are already assigned to this work rule.
ShiftAlreadyAssignedToWorkRule: This shift is already assigned to this work rule.
SaveWorkRuleFirstToAddShifts: Please save the work rule first before adding shifts.
SaveWorkRuleFirstToAssignShifts: Please save the work rule first before assigning existing shifts.
ManageShiftsForThisWorkRule: Manage shifts for this work rule
CreateShiftSubtitle: Set the basic timing and optional break information for the new shift.
ManageEmployeeSalaryConfigurations: Manage employee salary configurations and settings
AmountConstraint: Amount must be greater than or equal to 0
HourlyRateConstraint: Hourly rate must be greater than or equal to 0
OvertimeRateConstraint: Overtime rate must be greater than or equal to 0
SalaryDetailsHint: Enter the base salary and optional overtime rate.
ReportCreationFailed: Failed to create salary report for {{employeeName}}
WorkRuleRequiredMessage: Employee {{employeeName}} does not have a work rule assigned. A work rule is required to generate salary reports.
AssignWorkRuleQuestion: Would you like to assign a work rule to this employee now?
ErrorCheckingWorkRule: Error checking employee work rule assignment
InvalidMonth: Invalid month. Please select a month between 1 and 12
InvalidYear: Invalid year. Please select a year between 2020 and 2030
EmployeeHasNoSalaryData: Employee has no salary configuration. Please set up employee salary first.
ErrorCheckingEmployeeData: Error checking employee data. Please try again.
WorkRuleTreatOffDaysAsRegular: Off-day work counts as regular hours
NoAssignedEmployees: No employees assigned to this work rule
NoShiftEmployees: No employees assigned to this shift yet.
UnassignEmployeeConfirm: Are you sure you want to unassign this employee from the work rule?
UnassignEmployeeFromShiftConfirm: Are you sure you want to unassign {{employeeName}} from the shift "{{shiftName}}"?
UnassignShiftFromWorkRuleConfirm: Are you sure you want to unassign the shift "{{shiftName}}" from the work rule "{{workRuleName}}"?
NoEmployeesAssignedToThisRule: No employees have been assigned to this work rule yet.
SelectAtLeastOneWorkRule: Please select at least one work rule
WorkRuleForShiftMulti: Select one or more work rules associated with the shift
PleaseFillShiftDetails: Please fill in the shift details then click save
IsThereBreakHint: Check if this shift includes a break period
IsBreakFixedHint: Check if the break time is fixed, otherwise it's flexible
BreakStartTimeHint: Start time of the break period
BreakEndTimeHint: End time of the break period
OvernightHint: Does this shift cross the day or does it start on one day and end on the next day?
NoEmployeesAssignedToShift: No employees assigned to this shift
ToggleToMakePrivate: Toggle to make this rule private
PrivateRuleDescription: This rule is private and can be assigned to specific employees only
PublicRuleDescription: This rule is public and can be assigned to any employee
LateArrivalToleranceHint: The system will allow a grace period of {{minutes}} minutes before applying late arrival deductions
EarlyDepartureToleranceHint: The system will allow a grace period of {{minutes}} minutes before applying early departure deductions
LateDeductionHint: The system will deduct 1 full hour from salary for every {{minutes}} minutes late
EarlyDepartureDeductionHint: The system will deduct 1 full hour from salary for every {{minutes}} minutes early departure
OvertimeMultiplierHint: The system will multiply the normal hourly rate by {{multiplier}} to calculate overtime pay
MinimumOvertimeMinutesHint: The system will only count overtime if it reaches {{minutes}} minutes or more
AbsenceDeductionMultiplierHint: The system will deduct {{multiplier}} day(s) for each day of absence
AllowedAbsenceDaysPerMonth: Allowed Absence Days Without Deduction (per month)
AllowedAbsenceDaysPerMonthHint: The system will exempt {{days}} absences per month from deduction
AreOffDaysPaidDescription: The system will pay for off days and will not deduct them from the employee's salary
AllowWorkDuringOffDaysDescriptionOn: Employees can clock in during off days and the hours will be counted.
AllowWorkDuringOffDaysDescriptionOff: Attendance on off days will be rejected and no hours will be counted.
TreatOffDayWorkAsOvertimeDescriptionOn: Hours worked on off days will use the overtime multiplier.
TreatOffDayWorkAsOvertimeDescriptionOff: Hours worked on off days will be paid using the custom hourly rate.
WorkRuleOffDayHourlyRateHint: Leave empty to use the default hourly rate.
EmployeeSalariesComingSoon: Employee Salaries management will be available soon.
SalaryReportsComingSoon: Salary Reports management will be available soon.
StartByAddingEmployeeSalary: Start by adding an employee salary configuration
DeleteSalaryConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the salary for {{name}}?
DeleteSalaryReportConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the salary report for {{employeeName}} ({{month}}/{{year}})? This action cannot be undone.
PleaseWait: Please wait while we load the data
NoSalaryReportsDescription: No salary reports have been generated yet. Generate reports to view salary data.
CalculationBreakdown.HoursLine: Hours analysis: Expected {{expected}}h | Worked {{worked}}h | Deficit {{deficit}}h | Surplus {{surplus}}h
CalculationBreakdown.FinalLine: Final calculation: Gross {{gross}} - Deductions {{deductions}} + Bonuses {{bonuses}} = Net {{net}}
EnterEmployeeIDsCommaSeparated: Enter employee IDs, separated by commas

SUCCESS.TITLE: Success
SUCCESS.SHIFT_ASSIGNMENT: Employees added to the shift successfully!
SUCCESS.SHIFT_ASSIGNED_TO_WORK_RULE: Shift assigned to work rule successfully.

ERROR.TITLE: Error
ERROR.FAILED_TO_MARK_REPORT_AS_PAID: Failed to mark report as paid
ERROR.UNKNOWN_LOGIN_ERROR: An unknown error occurred during login. Please try again.
ERROR.UNAUTHORIZED_LOGIN: Invalid username or password. Please try again.
ERROR.REGISTER_EMPLOYEE_ERROR: An error occurred while registering employee.
ERROR.PROCESS_REQUEST_FAILED: Failed to process request. Please try again.
ERROR.UNKNOWN_ERROR_FETCHING_FINANCIAL_STATS: Unknown error occurred while fetching financial statistics.
ERROR.UNKNOWN_ERROR_FETCHING_WORK_RULES: Unknown error occurred while fetching work rules.
ERROR.WORK_RULE_REQUIRES_SHIFTS: This work rule does not have any shifts yet. Please create a shift before assigning employees.
ERROR.SELECT_WORK_RULE_AND_SHIFT: Please choose both a work rule and a shift first.
ERROR.NO_ELIGIBLE_EMPLOYEES_SHIFT: No employees are available to assign to this shift.
ERROR.SHIFT_ASSIGNMENT_FAILED: Failed to assign employees to the shift.
ERROR.SHIFT_NOT_FOUND: We could not find the selected shift. Please reload the work rules.
ERROR.UNKNOWN_ERROR_FETCHING_EMPLOYEE_SALARIES: Unknown error occurred while fetching employee salaries.
ERROR.UNKNOWN_ERROR_FETCHING_SALARY_REPORTS: Unknown error occurred while fetching salary reports.
ERROR.USER_CREATION_FAILED: Failed to create user for employee.
ERROR.USERNAME_MINLENGTH: Username must be at least 4 characters long.
ERROR.PASSWORD_MINLENGTH: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
ERROR.TIME_OUT_NOT_ALLOWED_FOR_ATTENDANCE: Time Out is not allowed for Attendance.
ERROR.TIME_IN_NOT_ALLOWED_FOR_DEPARTURE: Time In is not allowed for Departure.
ERROR.FETCH_EMPLOYEES_ERROR: An error occurred while fetching employees.
ERROR.EMPLOYEE_NAME_OR_PHONE_REQUIRED: Employee name or phone is required.
ERROR.EMPLOYEE_NOT_FOUND: Employee not found. Please enter a valid employee name or phone number.
ERROR.ADD_EMPLOYEE_ERROR: An error occurred while adding employee.
ERROR.UPDATE_EMPLOYEE_ERROR: An error occurred while updating employee.
ERROR.NAME_MINLENGTH: Name must be at least 3 characters long.
ERROR.CARD_NUMBER_MINLENGTH: Card Number must be at least 4 characters long.
ERROR.SALARY_AMOUNT_MIN: Salary amount must be zero or greater.
ERROR.HOURLY_RATE_REQUIRED: Hourly rate is required for this salary type.
ERROR.HOURLY_RATE_MIN: Hourly rate must be zero or greater.
ERROR.OVERTIME_RATE_MIN: Overtime rate must be zero or greater.
ERROR.ASSIGN_WORK_RULE_FAILED: Failed to assign work rule to the employee.
ERROR.ASSIGN_EMPLOYEES_TO_SHIFT_FIRST: Assign employees to one of the work rule shifts first: {{names}}.
ERROR.ASSIGN_SHIFT_FAILED: Failed to assign shift to the employee.
ERROR.EMPLOYEE_ALREADY_ASSIGNED_ANOTHER_SHIFT: This employee is already assigned to another shift.
ERROR.UNASSIGN_EMPLOYEE_FROM_SHIFT_FAILED: Failed to unassign employee from shift.
ERROR.UNASSIGN_SHIFT_FROM_WORK_RULE_FAILED: Failed to unassign shift from work rule.
ERROR.FAILED_TO_ASSIGN_SHIFT_TO_WORK_RULE: Failed to assign shift to work rule.
ERROR.CREATE_SALARY_FAILED: Failed to create the employee salary configuration.
ERROR.FETCH_ATTENDANCES_ERROR: An error occurred while fetching attendance records.
ERROR.ADD_ATTENDANCE_ERROR: An error occurred while adding attendance record.
ERROR.UPDATE_ATTENDANCE_ERROR: An error occurred while updating attendance record.
ERROR.DELETE_ATTENDANCE_ERROR: An error occurred while deleting attendance record.
ERROR.DELETE_EMPLOYEE_ERROR: An error occurred while deleting employee.
ERROR.LOAD_ATTENDANCE_FAILED: Failed to load attendance record details.
ERROR.LOAD_ATTENDANCE_ERROR: An error occurred while loading attendance record details.
ERROR.TIME_IN_REQUIRED_FOR_ATTENDANCE: Time In is required for Attendance.
ERROR.TIME_OUT_REQUIRED_FOR_DEPARTURE: Time Out is required for Departure.
ERROR.TIME_IN_NOT_ALLOWED_FOR_DEPARTURE: Time In is not allowed for Departure.
ERROR.TIME_OUT_NOT_ALLOWED_FOR_ATTENDANCE: Time Out is not allowed for Attendance.
ERROR.INVALID_TIME_SEQUENCE: Time Out must be later than Time In.
ERROR.TITLE: Error
ERROR.SERVER_NOT_AVAILABLE: Server not available. Please try again later.
ERROR.BAD_REQUEST: Invalid request. Please check your input and try again.
ERROR.SERVER_ERROR: An unexpected server error occurred. Please try again later.
ERROR.REGISTER_EMPLOYEE_ERROR: An error occurred during employee registration.
ERROR.REQUEST_PROCESSING_ERROR: An error occurred during request processing.
ERROR.FETCH_MONTHLY_HOURS_FAILED: Failed to fetch monthly worked hours.
ERROR.FETCH_MONTHLY_HOURS_ERROR: An error occurred while fetching monthly worked hours.
